sections.us_1: Hi! We're Luca & Giulia. Our story started five years ago with a coffee that turned into countless adventures. From late-night pizza runs to spontaneous weekend trips, we've been partners in laughter, support, and all the little things that make life sweet.
sections.us_2: Now, we're excited to take the next big stepâ€”celebrating our love with all of you!
sections.us_3: We can't wait to share this special day surrounded by the people who've been part of our journey.
sections.where_and_when: We're getting married on June 15, 2024, in the beautiful countryside. The ceremony will take place at 4 PM, followed by a reception filled with love, laughter, and dancing!
sections.menu: We've curated a menu that reflects our favorite flavors. From appetizers to desserts, we can't wait for you to indulge in this culinary journey with us!
sections.gift_registry: Your presence at our wedding is the greatest gift of all! However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, we've created a registry to help guide you.
